title: Diagnosis of speech and reading problems
brief_description: This film demonstrates various tests that the teacher can use to evaluate a student’s neurological development. These include visual pursuit, cortical dominance, cross-pattern creeping, and similar procedures. Slow-motion scenes and freeze frames enhance the value of this training film. (Teacher education)
